hero.name: Sri Haryo Trah Pamungkas
hero.subtitle: Junior Developer & UI/UX Designer passionate about creating beautiful and functional digital experiences

about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm a passionate developer with 5+ years of experience in creating digital solutions that make a difference. I love turning complex problems into simple and beautiful designs.
about.paragraph1: Started as a curious student who loved solving problems through computers. Over the years, I've explored technology and helped bring digital visions to life.
about.paragraph2: I believe in continuous learning and staying updated with the latest technologies. When not coding, you'll find me exploring new design trends, contributing to open source, or sharing knowledge with the developer community.

cleanCode.title: Clean Code
cleanCode.description: Writing maintainable, scalable code with best practices and modern technologies.

creativeDesign.title: Creative Design
creativeDesign.description: Crafting beautiful, intuitive user interfaces that provide exceptional user experiences.

performance.description: Building fast, optimized applications that deliver results and exceed expectations.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Ready to work together? I'd love to hear from you. Send me a message and I'll respond as soon as possible.
contact.intro: I'm always interested in new opportunities and exciting projects. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, feel free to reach out!
